name: gsconnect-webextension
description: Share links with GSConnect, direct to the browser or by SMS.

scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && TARGET=chrome vite build
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && TARGET=firefox vite build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.zip:all: npm run zip:chrome && npm run zip:firefox
scripts.clean:dist: npm run clean:chrome && npm run clean:firefox
scripts.pack: npm run i18n && npm run build:all && npm run zip:all && npm run clean:dist
